Module com.example.pt2025_30422_larisa_pasca_assignment_3
Package dataModel

Class Order

java.lang.Object
dataModel.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order placed by a client.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Order()
    Default constructor.
    Order(int id, int clientId, int productId, int quantity, LocalDateTime orderDate)
    Constructs an Order with all fields including the ID.
    Order(int clientId, int productId, int quantity, LocalDateTime orderDate)
    Constructs an Order without an ID (typically used before persistence).

    • Order

      public Order()
      Default constructor.

    • Order

      public Order(int id, int clientId, int productId, int quantity, LocalDateTime orderDate)
      Constructs an Order with all fields including the ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the order ID
      clientId - the ID of the client placing the order
      productId - the ID of the product being ordered
      quantity - the quantity ordered
      orderDate - the date and time when the order was placed

    • Order

      public Order(int clientId, int productId, int quantity, LocalDateTime orderDate)
      Constructs an Order without an ID (typically used before persistence).
      Parameters:
      clientId - the ID of the client placing the order
      productId - the ID of the product being ordered
      quantity - the quantity ordered
      orderDate - the date and time when the order was placed
